vegetation_loss.description: Triggers when NDVI drop indicates vegetation clearing or degradation
vegetation_loss.description_template: NDVI analysis shows a decline of {ndvi_drop:.2f} in vegetation index. This could indicate land clearing, degradation, or seasonal die-off.

mining_expansion.description: Triggers when BSI increase indicates new excavation or exposed soil
mining_expansion.description_template: Increase in Bare Soil Index suggests expansion of active mining pits, tailings zones, or haul roads.

water_accumulation.description: Triggers when NDWI increase indicates new water bodies or flooding
water_accumulation.description_template: NDWI indicates potential new water accumulation. Check for pit flooding, tailings dam leaks, or seasonal pooling.

boundary_breach.description: Triggers when change zones extend outside approved lease boundary
boundary_breach.message: Unauthorized activity detected outside lease boundary
boundary_breach.description_template: Change detection identified activity beyond the approved mining lease boundary. This requires immediate investigation for compliance.
